name: Kaylen Laderoute
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Dear Trimmer,

My name is Kaylen Laderoute. When I was young I followed the whole legalization of weed and even did a report on the benefits of the measure being passed. I've always enjoyed plants and the process of the growth. I have patiently awaited my 21st birthday to legally work within the cannabis business. Cannabis is used as medicine too. Which is the other field of my interest. So I feel like this opportunity to work with trimmers is my foot in the door to my career.
